name: Visibility Viewer
author: Finau H Kaufusi

sections.description:
What is Visibility Viewer?

Visibility viewer is a simple plugin that handle the private page visibility. The default behaviour of a private page, is display the 404 page error if access by anonymous user. Visibility viewer overwrite the page content with a custom error message if access by anonymous user.
sections.installation:
To install in regular WordPress:

  1. Upload the visibility-viewr folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Now logout from your wordpress site and open your private page, you should see the error message instructions
